from enum import Enum




[docs]
class Signal(str, Enum):
    BUY = "BUY"
    SELL = "SELL"
    HOLD = "HOLD"






[docs]
class OrderType(str, Enum):
    LIMIT = "LIMIT"
    MARKET = "MARKET"






[docs]
class Exchange(str, Enum):
    NYSE = "NYSE"
    NASDAQ = "NASDAQ"
    CRYPTO = "CRYPTO"
    EMPTY = ""
    UNKNOWN = "UNKNOWN"






[docs]
class PositionDirection(str, Enum):
    SHORT = "short"
    LONG = "long"
